summary: RECALL 01V093000. THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A CHANGE IN THE RECALL SCOPE FOR HIS VEHICLE.  *AK   THE CONSUMER WANTED TO SEEK PENALTIES AGAINST VOLVO IF THEY KNOWINGLY  DID NOT IDENTIFY THE SAFETY DEFECT AND ORDER VOLVO TO ADDRESS THE GROSS AXLE WEIGHT RATING STATE JURISDICTION RESTRICTIONS ON VEHICLES INVOLVED IN RECALLS.  *CB  *JB
